topic.title: TiddlyWiki on Zeronet
topic.body:
I would like to set-up a website using TiddlyWiki, since i'm new to this architecture.... i would like to know if is possible.
If so, where i'm supposed to load the backend? Do this need some adaptation to work on ZeroNet?

1_1Da4ebREvCs4FX8pME6HGhuS8yqMHvPw8r.body:
i've tried to clone 127.0.0.1:43110/1g9s2eptrshvmmxar1egengcbl9wdeqfaa
without luck, any suggestion?
